name: Escape the Nightmare (GalaxyVinci05)
description:
A dungeon game made for Mini Jam 105! The theme was "Dreamy" and the limitation was that each playthrough of the game has to be unique.

In this game you wake up in your bedroom, but it looks a little different from what it used to be, in fact you're trapped in a nightmare, and you'll be able to do nothing but walk around the world searching for the 5 lost keys which will let you escape this nightmare.

But there's more! There are 5 total stages, from the overworld to the dungeon, and each stage has one key, but each time you leave the stage, you'll end up in a random one! And if that wasn't enough, the key in each stage will have a 25% chance of appearing!

Will you be able to wake up from this never ending nightmare?

Controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move

Goal:
Collect all 5 lost keys to escape the nightmare

Credits and sources:
Game by me
Sprites and art by plutoniantoad (link to her Instagram)
Music from CanariPack 8BIT TopDown (dungeon sprites were also inspired by this pack)
